quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi
quotes.quote: Do nothing that is of no use.

quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi
quotes.quote: Perceive that which cannot be seen with the eye.

quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi
quotes.quote: The way is in training.

quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi
quotes.quote: You must understand that there is more than one path to the top of the mountain.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu
quotes.quote: Appear at points which the enemy must hasten to defend; march swiftly to places where you are not expected.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu
quotes.quote: In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu
quotes.quote: He will win who knows when to fight and when not to fight.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu
quotes.quote: Let your plans be dark and impenetrable as night, and when you move, fall like a thunderbolt.

quotes.author: Yamamoto Tsunetomo
quotes.quote: The way of the Samurai is found in death.

quotes.author: Yamamoto Tsunetomo
quotes.quote: A man who has not once submitted to the pain of defeat will never truly know his own limits.

quotes.author: Yamamoto Tsunetomo
quotes.quote: The more a warrior cultivates the mind, the less he fears death.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: You have power over your mind – not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: He who fears death will never do anything worthy of a living man.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: The greater the difficulty, the more glory in surmounting it.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: If you want to improve, be content to be thought foolish and stupid.

quotes.author: Musashi-style
quotes.quote: Strike with clarity, and the enemy falters before your resolve.

quotes.author: Musashi-style
quotes.quote: No hesitation, no mercy, only precision.

quotes.author: Musashi-style
quotes.quote: Train beyond exhaustion; mastery is born from relentless effort.

quotes.author: Musashi-style
quotes.quote: Control yourself or be controlled by others.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu-style
quotes.quote: Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu-style
quotes.quote: Swift as the wind, silent as the forest, fierce as fire, immovable as a mountain.

quotes.author: Yamamoto-style
quotes.quote: A warrior sees death daily and yet lives fully.

quotes.author: Yamamoto-style
quotes.quote: Every action is a blade; wield it with focus.

quotes.author: Modern Shinobi
quotes.quote: Master the code as you master the sword.

quotes.author: Modern Shinobi
quotes.quote: Efficiency is the silent killer of mediocrity.

quotes.author: Modern Shinobi
quotes.quote: Discipline is your strongest weapon; guard it ruthlessly.

quotes.author: Modern Shinobi
quotes.quote: Time wasted is a wound that never heals.

quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi
quotes.quote: Perceive that which cannot be seen with the eye; feel that which cannot be felt with the hand.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu
quotes.quote: Move swiftly to strike where the enemy is weakest.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: Do every act of your life as though it were your last.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: A sword is not strong because it is sharp, but because it is wielded without fear.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: Make the impossible, possible through relentless persistence.

quotes.author: Musashi-style
quotes.quote: Victory is born from preparation, not chance.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu-style
quotes.quote: He conquers who conquers himself.

quotes.author: Yamamoto-style
quotes.quote: Embrace pain; it is the forge of strength.

quotes.author: Modern Shinobi
quotes.quote: Code, fight, endure — repeat until mastery is inevitable.

quotes.author: Modern Shinobi
quotes.quote: Silence your fear before it silences you.

quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi
quotes.quote: Do not sleep under a roof. Carry your life with you.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu
quotes.quote: If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need not fear the result of a hundred battles.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: Be like the cliff against which the waves continually break; but it stands firm and tames the fury of the water.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: No man is free who is not master of himself.

quotes.author: Musashi-style
quotes.quote: One who conquers the self, conquers all.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu-style
quotes.quote: A leader leads by example, not by force.

quotes.author: Yamamoto-style
quotes.quote: A man must die or master himself — there is no middle path.

quotes.author: Modern Shinobi
quotes.quote: Ruthlessness begins within; sweep out weakness before it touches others.

quotes.author: Modern Shinobi
quotes.quote: Every second wasted is a blade dulled.

quotes.author: Musashi-style
quotes.quote: Think lightly of yourself and deeply of the world.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu-style
quotes.quote: Opportunities multiply as they are seized.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: Do not act as if you were going to live ten thousand years. Death hangs over you. Live now.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: He who is brave is free.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.

quotes.author: Musashi-style
quotes.quote: Know your strategy and strike without hesitation.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu-style
quotes.quote: Move like the shadows, strike like lightning.

quotes.author: Yamamoto-style
quotes.quote: Strength is born from relentless self-examination.

quotes.author: Modern Shinobi
quotes.quote: Master your body, master your craft, master your fate.

quotes.author: Modern Shinobi
quotes.quote: Pain is a teacher; listen carefully.

quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi
quotes.quote: Think lightly of life, deeply of death.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu
quotes.quote: Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: Reject your comfort, embrace your discipline.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste much of it.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: No man is free who cannot command himself.

quotes.author: Musashi-style
quotes.quote: Mastery requires blood, sweat, and solitude.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu-style
quotes.quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.

quotes.author: Yamamoto-style
quotes.quote: Death is the companion of every warrior; fear it not.

quotes.author: Modern Shinobi
quotes.quote: Silence is the weapon of the focused mind.

quotes.author: Modern Shinobi
quotes.quote: Every hour untrained is a chain around your potential.

quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi
quotes.quote: Do not let the mind be clouded by desire or fear.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu
quotes.quote: Move swiftly, strike decisively, vanish silently.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: You are a little soul carrying a corpse — do not waste your soul.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: Bravery is the art of being the master of fear.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: Make virtue your only possession.

quotes.author: Musashi-style
quotes.quote: Victory belongs to the prepared mind.

quotes.author: Sun Tzu-style
quotes.quote: One who knows himself and the enemy will not be defeated.

quotes.author: Yamamoto-style
quotes.quote: Pain is temporary; regret is eternal.

quotes.author: Modern Shinobi
quotes.quote: Discipline your habits, or they will discipline you.

quotes.author: Modern Shinobi
quotes.quote: Fear is a blade; grip it and it cuts you, release it and it cuts nothing.
